transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haanji sir good morning.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Sir main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi thi actually kal aapne call kara tha na to aapka thoda sa open nahi tha due to some reason.
Customer: Madam wo to kuch bhi open nahi ho raha hai IndiaMART ka.
Executive: Wahi main keh rahi hu sir kya issue aa raha hai video meeting pe sir aa sakte ho aap abhi.
Customer: Madam buyleads open nahi ho rahe.
Executive: Buylead open nahi ho raha sir matlab aapka catalog open ho raha hai.
Customer: Meri baat suniye catalog open ho raha hai magar jab buylead pe click karte hai na.
Hmm hmm.
Customer: Buylead pe click karte hai to wo kuch bhi show nahi dikha raha hai.
Uspe usse aa raha hai baad me last me aa raha hai aborted.
Executive: Kab se sir ye ho raha hai.
Customer: Madam ye che saat din se ho raha hai khali mere ko hi nahi balki bahut sare yaha pe panch che bande hai unko ho raha hai.
Executive: Aap ek baar sir abhi IndiaMART me login karna ek baar log out karke fir se login kariye ek baar.
On call hi kariye ek baar.
Customer: Thik hai main aapko main gaadi chala raha hu main baad me karta hu.
Executive: Kab call kar paoge sir ek baar main ye dekh lu aapka kya issue hai.
Customer: Madam aap aap na mere ko ek ghante ke baad call karna.
Executive: 11 baje kar lu sir.
Customer: Aaa abhi kitna bajega 10 baj raha hai sir. Saade saade 11 karna call.
Executive: Chalo thik hai main aapko 11:30 baje. Okay mam okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's buyleads are not opening in IndiaMART.

- Issue occurring for the past 6-7 days.

- Issue is not isolated; affecting 5-6 others.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to log out and log in again.

- Executive suggested doing it on the call.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after one hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, login, technical issue
